name: HAXANOID
description:
(The game has been updated, play the Jam version if you're looking to rate the jam game)

You got your hands on a hacked version of ARKANOID. 
Are you ready to bring the challenge down to your level?
Inject your favourite hack/exploit to conquer the leaderboards!

W/A/S/D or Arrow Keys to move Spacebar to perform action
